title: Mobile Flying Theatres & Mobile LED Domes Dataset
description: Schema for mobile-flying-theatres dataset â€“ global list of mobile flying theatre and mobile LED dome installations in the immersive media sector.

id.description: Unique identifier for the installation (slug or code).

name.description: Name of the mobile venue or installation.

manufacturer.description: Manufacturer or operator of the mobile venue.

type.description: Type of installation: Flying Theatre or LED Dome.

seat_count.description: Number of seats in the installation, if applicable.

dome_diameter_m.description: Dome diameter in metres, if applicable.

led_panel_area_m2.description: Area of LED panels in square metres, if applicable.

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code of primary deployment.

region.description: Macro region or state/province if known.

city.description: Primary city or base location of the installation.

latitude.description: Latitude of base location in WGS84 decimal degrees.

longitude.description: Longitude of base location in WGS84 decimal degrees.

first_deployment_date.description: Date when the mobile installation was first deployed.

latest_deployment_date.description: Date of most recent known deployment.

status_active.description: True if the installation is currently active/in operation; false if retired or out of service.

source.description: Primary source name used for verification (e.g., manufacturer website, press release).

source_url.description: URL of the main reference used to verify this entry.

notes.description: Free-text notes about deployment, version changes, or incomplete data.
